Package me.julb.applications.announcement.controllers

Class AnnouncementController

  • java.lang.Object
    • me.julb.applications.announcement.controllers.AnnouncementController
  • @RestController
@Validated
@RequestMapping(path="/announcements",
                produces="application/json")
public class AnnouncementController
extends java.lang.Object
    The rest controller to manage announcements.

        @GetMapping(path="/{id}")
@PreAuthorize("hasPermission(#id, \'announcement\', \'read\')")

      • create

        @PostMapping(consumes="application/json")
@ResponseStatus(CREATED)
@PreAuthorize("hasPermission(\'announcement\', \'create\')")
public AnnouncementDTO create​(@RequestBody @NotNull @Valid
                              @NotNull @Valid AnnouncementCreationDTO creationDTO)
        Creates an announcement.
        Parameters:
        creationDTO - the DTO to create the announcement.
        Returns:

        @PutMapping(path="/{id}",
            consumes="application/json")
@PreAuthorize("hasPermission(#id, \'announcement\', \'update\')")
public AnnouncementDTO update​(@PathVariable @Identifier
                              @Identifier java.lang.String id,

                              @NotNull @Valid AnnouncementUpdateDTO updateDTO)

@PreAuthorize("hasPermission(#id, \'announcement\', \'update\')")
